review_text: Great course. It met my expectations.

I am looking forward to applying everything I have learned to my blog.  I have been blogging for 4 years, and there is so much for me to learn!  I love the outline it allows for great notes and the added content calendar.
Excellent information

The course was good, I found the content helpful as a new freelancer. The first question in the second test listed the correct answer as the incorrect answer, and then it stated the correct answer which is what I picked.

Maddie provided clear and practical tips that can be implemented immediately! I would certainly recommend the course to anyone seeking to improve their writing skills. Thank you for the well thought out content and engaging delivery. üòä

Super helpful! Great ideas to generate more engaging and thoughtful content.  I have been writing blogs on the topic of real estate for the past 5 months and wanted to step up my game.  This course will do just that! Thank you!
Average
It was my first course with Fiverr and I m happy to say that it was top notch.
I loved this course for the quick essential tips that are easy to understand and start implementing right away.
Super easy to digest.  Great practical advice.
Really great course! Valuable material and insights from an experienced blogger. Concise and practical content. Thank you.

I thoroughly enjoyed this course and thought it was very well-structured, beautifully delivered, highly professional, informative, comprehensive and overall delightful to listen to.  Oh, and the styling of the video is like, award-winning level! 
Thanks so much, Maddy! 

:) Netta
Great course, very helpful on processes for making great blog posts.

This course helped me organize my content and provided me with helpful tips, tools, insight, strategies, and resources that I can't wait to implement. 

Maddie's calm nature made the content easy to digest, and I would definitely recommend this course to those seeking advice regarding improving their blog content and strategies.
This course is packed with valuable information and helpful tips. Thank you!
I really enjoyed this course! It was thoughtfully planned out and gave me the tools I need to begin writing blogs. It gave me the confidence and direction I was looking for.

I really enjoyed taking this course. The information is presented in a clear and concise way, making it easy and enjoyable to go through. In addition to this, the course is divided into short, bit-sized chunks of information, which means that it's easy to pause and start up at your convenience.

As a host, Maddie is a warm and engaging educator, whose vast experience in the subject makes the course particularly in-depth despite its length.

All in all, an excellent course. I'm very happy I took it.
This was really helpful for me to understand the material.  I really like the flow of the course as well as the short videos and quizzes.
Very informative but I wish it included a section on working with clients. How that would look and how to present yourself as a freelance writer and not just for your own blog.
This is a great course for those who are new or already familiar with writing. I enjoyed filling my notebook with helpful notes!
A great course from Maddie, very useful information for all experience levels. Give it a watch, it's well worth your time!

This course is informational and inspirational. Some of the info was a bit intuitive to me, but the course also provides some great tips, tools, and tricks. The host is pleasant and makes the info easy to digest.
Maddie does an excellent job of breaking down the steps necessary for developing, writing, and publishing blog content.
This is great if you are new to blogging, with many links and other resources you can use once the course has finished

Maddie Cohen knows well how to articulate and is an expert in blogging but for SEO purposes blogging is overrated. I do appreciate that she mentions the alt-tag, whose content is crucial for boosting keywords connected to a website's images. Regarding the content advice she gives here in this very good tutorial, I need some time to think about the new information and process everything for a valuable conclusion.
Excellent course, even for those who have been putting pen to paper for a little while already. Maddie knows her stuff and does a fantastic job with the delivery.
Great Course! Very useful!! Can be recommended..
The information was good, with no fluff!
This was a great introductory course for me!
A brief, yet helpful course that helped me fill in the blanks where I wasn't sure about things. Thanks!
A lot of valuable content that I am excited to apply to my own work!
The information was presented very well. I really enjoyed this class, Thanks Maddie!
Excellent job and great work. Thanks

This is a good lesson. Bravo Maddie! She did explain everything so well, and I have learned new things in each lesson. I have hesitated to pay for this course, and I regretted it. I should have done this for a long time before I launched my posts. Now I have to go back at my previous posts to fix things. Thank you, Maddie.
Maddie did a great job of explaining the steps needed to create an engaging blog.

This course gave good information on the basics of why blogging is useful and how it can help your business but it was extremely lacking in the SEO portion with some sections lasting a mere 22 seconds.  This is information you can find for free on YouTube.
Thorough and informative. Thank you.

This course is brief and straight to the point. This is not a technical course showing you step by step how build and write a blog post. However I loved how the videos were extremely short and constructive. Thanks Maddie
It was an amazing course.

I'm totally new to writing, this course has lots of interesting and useful insights about this topic.
Also Maddie is a super nice person and teacher, I enjoyed watching this course. 
I can't wait to put everything I learned into practice!
Thank you.
Compelling and engaging content. It even convinced me to start my own blog to expand my traffic.
Great content. 5 start!

I'm not sure if I didn't learn much because of taking other copywriting courses, but I feel like the content was missing more detail and further examples. Maddie seems to have a great insight on blogging but it seems as though she forgot that the viewers don't: she sped through each topic and I had to keep pausing and reviewing videos because she spoke too quickly.

A solid foundation for folks looking to get into blog post writing. I feel confident that I can open a gig on Fiverr using the knowledge that I gained from this course. The course was organized, engaging, compelling, and succinct. Maddie provided a wealth of tools and tips for new bloggers. I specifically valued the chapters on how to write for a target audience, the blog writing process, and the introduction to SEO concepts. I would have appreciated a bit more guidance on blog post outlining and possibly a template, but I'm sure further research on my own will supply this. I also left the course with confusion about "meta descriptions" in terms of SEO, but I recognize that this wasn't an SEO course and Maddie was simply providing the basics. All in all, the course was informative and well done. It is clear that Maddie knows her stuff and I am glad I took it!
I loved this, some great stuff I never thought about for my and others' blogs. Thank you!
Very good!
Liked the course. Got to learn few new things. But many things were general and ordinary to know. The course could have been more specific

This is a wonderful course for newcomers to the blogging world and intermediates. It shares a lot of important parts that people skip over unknowingly.  The only part I would change is the last chapter. It seemed to be the same information that was already said, just in different wording. But still a worthwhile course.
Very informative and helpful! I am excited to revamp my blog and put into practice all the strategies I have learned. I would recommend this course to any blogger.

A good course, but definitely one for beginners. Didn't go in-depth into any topic, and there was an error in the second quiz. However, if you're just starting out blogging and have no experience, this course is a fantastic introduction, and a good refresher if you haven't blogged in a while.
Excellent course, with useful and informative tips and information
Informative and enjoyable.
The Course highlights what we should do in a blog and that helped a lot. But a detailed deep dive into each of it with multiple examples would have helped.
I've finally found the right course to help me to put together blog posts people will actually read.

I loved this course! This is my first course on Fivver, and Maddie taught me how to write top-quality blog posts in an efficient and engaging manner.  I'm excited to implement my new skills and launch my own blog soon!  

Maddie, thank you so much for an excellent course. If you post any other courses on Fivver, I would love to take another one from you! :)

Maddie‚Äôs course is incredibly helpful and informative. I felt so unsure coming into the class, and even though I still have a few questions, I now have the resources to find the answers. That, to me, is invaluable. Thank you so much Maddie for your wonderful course!
Great course for beginners!
Very engaging course with plenty of helpful information for blog writing!
This course was super insightful and engaging. I can't wait to put what I learned into action!

The content of the course is straight to the point which is fine. However, I expected a bit more depth in the readability section and the lesson on writing headlines and ledes. I kept hearing the word "compelling" being used but the course doesn't address what makes something compelling.

Also, the instructor is robotic and clearly reading from a teleprompter. There's barely any tonal change and some of the more lighthearted aspects of their script don't even land.
This course was very informative and provided me with key insight concerning how I can professionally write and manage a blog. Thank you Maddie!
Really great course. Maddie is very dedicated and passionate about this topic and I love her sense of humor. I most definitely feel ready to start my own path to creating and running a blog.
I've been blogging a long time and still learned a lot through this course!
One of the Best courses on Fiverr.
The course was well organized and presented, but the info is fundamental and introductory. I think the title is misleading. The course should be marketed for beginners only.
I really liked the course and found the information given very valuable.

This really taught me some basics that I haven't been exposed to. Having studied English and Advertising in college, there were a lot of things I didn't learn. A concise and complete set of info like this is what I needed to give me basic knowledge on writing blogs. Thank you!

This course had useful content, but the delivery wasn't as good. The instructor wasn't great at speaking and it made it frustrating to listen to the entire course. Otherwise, the information and tips were helpful.
The content is a bit shallow compared to other Fiverr courses I have taken. The advice given is good, but overall basic.
Very understanding and organized glad I've taken this course
It helps me a lot not only to work writing on Fiverr, but also for a future project with Amazon Affiliate Marketing Blogs. Excellent indeed.

I'm looking for new sources of income and while I feel I'm a great writer, I've not written much for others and their needs.  This course gave me a solid foundation of understanding what this world looks like, how to approach writing, best practices and many great tools to help a writer with things like copyediting and proofreading.  Highly recommend!
Great resource for new content writers
Just amazing! Excellent course, both for beginners and experienced writers.

The instructor is very knowledgeable, and her presentation is easy to follow. I really liked the software/tools recommendations that she gave, and I know it all can help me to create better blogs. This course is worthwhile, for sure.

Maddie knows how to deliver great content in a concise and understandable manner. She helped reinforce things I knew and provide additional insight into areas I was weak in. 

Great course and I highly recommend it.

Thanks Maddie!
Great course! Perfect for people who run their own blogs and also for freelancers who are working as content writers on sites like Fiverr.

Really good and informative course!
If you were to update the course, it would be great to see you write an actual blog post/article from the research phase to publishing :)
As a beginner in blog post writing, this course was very helpful and informative.
10/10. This course was exceptional. I loved the different strategies, tools mentioned, and examples provided. This is a great course.
Great content less enthusiasm for the subject.

I think the course was ok, but I was a little disappointed. It definitely covers all the basics and gives a few examples, but I thought it would be more in-depth. This could be my fault for having different expectations, however. 

You can tell the creator definitely put a lot of time and effort in and you can also tell she is an expert. She seems a touch camera shy, but the content itself was very well explained. 

Overall, I would say that if you are absolutely new to writing and need basic instructions or if you are a business that wants to start an accompanying blog, this is a good resource. But if you are already familiar with writing or blogging, it might not be so helpful.

Excellent Excellent Course. The content was amazing, especially for a beginner like me. The author was very clear, precise and explained the concepts perfectly well. She knew what she was talking about and guided me step by step to understanding how to write engaging blogs. Wish there were one or two videos where she actually shows over the shoulder blog that she could write as a video in the course, that would be very helpful. None-the-less the course was engaging and excellent. I would highly recommend it
A lot of great information. Found the system (Yoast and Google Trends) recommendations most helpful
Very useful for beginners. Not very detailed on certain specific technical matters, but enough to start blogging!
It's a great course that briefly touched on some of the most critical elements we can look into when writing articles or blog posts.

the content is very stark.  I have to go to outside (FREE) sources to understand more precisely what's being taught here.  The beginning was okay, but the last half is not good at all.  I'm having problems finishing the course because of the diminishing content value.

this course have a fresh ideas on blog post that interesting  to learn about with views that make you think about and more to come and think about as you learn that can help more in your furture and goals in life.
Great course!
This course had so much great information and I learnt a lot!!
Maddie was very thorough and concise with her lessons. The information was tremendously helpful, and I would recommend her course to anyone wanting to improve their writing.
Super helpful! Thank you so much! I enjoyed learning the lessons and it was very informative.
Great course, thank you.
Great course, highly recommend! Covers all you need to know about blogging and blogging best practices.
Great beginner's course. Takes a thorough, yet digestible approach to "blogging: 101," making it very easy to follow and walk away with key information, imperative to having a successful blog.

Los primeros cap√≠tulos fueron agotadores, el solo ver a la presentadora por lapsos largos de tiempo y que sus ejemplos solo permanecieran en la pantalla por un corto lapso de tiempo que no sobrepasaba 2 segundos era cansado. Abandon√© el curso varias veces porque su manera de presentar era tediosa.

Con el paso de los cap√≠tulos, y una vez que me acostumbr√© a sus explicaciones largas, de pronto aparece con cap√≠tulos con una duraci√≥n de menos de 1 minuto con una explicaci√≥n muy lamentable y vaga que no val√≠a la pena tener separada de otro cap√≠tulo.

La edici√≥n de video era muy mala, a veces los t√≠tulos o subt√≠tulos no aparec√≠an en un cap√≠tulo y en otros s√≠. La corta duraci√≥n de los √°ngulos en varias tomas era muy cansada, duraban casi lo mismo que parpadear y le provocaban a uno hacerlo porque el cerebro no procesaba tranquilamente lo que ve√≠a.

La explicaci√≥n de la presentadora es pesada y carece de dinamismo. Habla un cap√≠tulo entero acerca de hacer un outline y para cierto punto entend√≠ que ella hab√≠a tomado un curso previo a hacer el suyo, mismo que yo tom√© antes de este, y pude apreciar que hab√≠a tomado tratado de copiar lo que ella aprendi√≥ en ese y tratar de aplicarlo en la escritura de Blogs, lo cual sali√≥ mal desde mi perspectiva.

Sugerir√≠a una reestructuraci√≥n completa del curso y que tuviera m√°s dinamismo y ejemplos, as√≠ como si pudiera yo sentir que ella en realidad domina su tema y no hay alguien al frente con tarjetas indic√°ndole que decir.

For a course that is so concise, Maddie sure covers a lot! This course had been particularly helpful in helping me decide what I am able to do myself, and what I will need to look to other experts to assist with on my blog. Sincere appreciation, Maddie.

-Dean
Awesome -  Highly recommend this informative course.
Quick and to the point. Excellent course for someone just starting out!
Inspiring insights and detailed discussion!
She's very clear and goes right to the point of each subject.
Some good points, but it feels crammed many ideas packed in and then brushed over in 40 seconds. Also felt very flat.
Awesome tips and best practices on blog post writing!

It was okay. You can tell she is a very successful writer, but she wasn't the best teacher. She over explained simple things and under explained the things I would have loved to learn more about, like SEO, meta descriptions, and alt text. I've never heard of meta descriptions or alt text, and she spoke in a way that indicated we should already know this. It just needed a little bit more explaining, but overall, I did learn something from this course so in the end I am happy I took it.

Maddie shared some key insights for creating well-structured and engaging articles and blog posts. It was very enlightening to learn her writing process and the tools that can help any writer/blogger become masterful when creating new pieces of relevant and engaging content. Thanks again!
Amazing tips. Just go for it.
The course was helpful and I enjoyed the format of it.
Very informative!
Extremely helpful!
I found the information very helpful; thank you. @_ariel_vibes
Very helpful.

The BPW course is a great course with all the vital areas blueprinted for you to just start. I knew a lot coming in and appreciate the refresher but was given in-depth details to consider.  Enjoyed this very much on a snowy, cold night up in the north somewhere.
Simple and thorough: goes through everything you need to know in the best way.
Unique and simple to understand better techniques and strategies to improve our freelance writing experience!

Great Knowledge, There is a mistake in the chapter 2 quiz. I selected that customers are more important, but the answer said that prospects are more important (even though in the summary of the answer it says customers). Looks like the answers are flip-flopped perhaps? In general the entire course is AMAZING! As a seller on Fiverr, I've learned how to truly create SEO optimized content, and offer more services because of this course. Thank you Maddie and Fiverr team!

This course was a thorough look at how to write & edit compelling blogs that fit with any brand. It taught me about content strategy and branding to help me elevate the work I offer to my clients. Maddie was an engaging teacher and the course was enjoyable!
It was comprehensive and densed with valuable tactics.
Loads of great and valuable content.
This course was more than excellent! It was pretty straightforward and compelling. Thank you for sharing your knowledge.
A bit dull at times, not at all aimed at freelancers despite being marketed on a freelancer website.
Fantastic Course Maddie! Definitely recommend.
Well organized and excellent content.  Thank you Maddie!
The course was well structure and easily understood. I learned a lot.

I learned so many things I thought I knew already about beginning my own blog. I plan on launching soon, so this course was exactly what I needed. It was so interesting that I completed it all in one sitting and plan to go back and revisit for more details on certain topics. I have 3 pages of notes and can't wait to formulate my content. Thanks Maddie!

If you're looking for a course that will teach you how to write engaging blog posts, this is the course for you! The topics are well discussed and very helpful and informative. However, it was very obvious that the speaker was reading off the script in a monotone voice. But still, the content is valuable and worth a look.
Incredibly helpful for anyone looking to improve their writing for content marketing.

Great course. The content is exactly what I was looking for. I loved the brief, to-the-point videos that allowed me to complete the entire course in a day. The delivery could be a bit more engaging, but overall, no complaints here.
The material and entire presentation were great!
Best for beginners!!!
Amazing course! She really knows her stuff
Great information

Very general and talked letting the flow of energy. It is an introduction as then you need to take action and there are things as analytics I do not know to do. She is very good and has a lovely communication to share her knowledge. Well done beautiful soul.
The material was very informative.  I learn new things that I can now put to use in my own writing.
Overall, this was a very good course. The information was presented in a logical, easy-to-understand manner which is very helpful to the beginning blogger.

I would HIGHLY recommend this for anyone looking to write blogs! Great educational advice! I feel fully prepared to start my blog and help people with theirs! (If the video freezes after pausing, drag the slider to the beginning and let it play from there. Then pull it to where you left off.)

I recommend this course to anyone wanting to further their blogs/writing careers. Maddie Cohen is an incredible teacher. I am more confident in making engaging blog posts (ESPECIALLY SEO, which was something I didn't understand until now).

I‚Äôm so glad that I decided to purchase this course! It has served as a great investment in my personal growth as a copywriter and has given me a better understanding of my client‚Äôs needs as someone who writes for various blogs on Fiverr. This cohesive course offered useful information in a variety of areas. Whoever is thinking of starting a blog or looking to sharpen their skills should absolutely invest in this course!
Love this course!
Very informative and eye-opening!
Very nice course, Thank you
Does a good job in presenting the bigger picture of blogging but it doesn't offer any further value. It felt like a waste of funds and time.

My name is Ricardo Croes, in my opinion it is important to study these techniques for Blog Post Writing and inform our audience or costumers what they need to now about the content of my book " The book of Hedu " I belief that we can not make it without Blog Post Writing, it must be Mandatory. Thanks again.
This segment was thorough and informative.  It gave me more insight and resources.
Nice
Educative and informative. Thanks, Maddie Cohen

very thorough and thought provoking. a lot of great tips and organized well. my only note for improvement is to spend a little more time on the seo or to merge some topics into the same video so that each video isn't so short. It was a little tricky trying to keep up taking notes before the videos timed out
Amazing!
Maddie offered a great foundational course to successful blog writing. It gave some guidance and the navigational necessities that I needed! Excited to review my notes and move forward.
The instructor makes it easy to understand! Highly recommend.
Great course.
It's good
A very helpful and to the point course.
Good and helpful information I can apply today
Maddie gives a great overview of blog writing, SEO enhancing, reviewing, and posting - well worth the fee.
Included all the information I was hoping for.

It was just "ok". I felt there could have been more examples in terms of the blogs which would could have potentially painted a broader picture of SEO. It was a bit short for a course but was straightforward which I liked.
Good points raised so far
Very interesting course!
She‚Äôs hittin the fuckin points, and I low how calm and confident she is!
Great Course!
great work thank you
Standard coverage of blog post education, delivered in a fairly lukewarm tone.
The keywords/SEO section could've been expanded on a lot.

It was informative, but it was very monotonous hard to stay engaged with the content.

Could've been better with more indepth examples.
A good basic dive into blogging.  Best for beginners but I did gain some pointers.
A handy guide for newbies. I appreciate every bit of it. Chapter 5 could benefit from a few examples. Other than that, it's a great course. Thank you!
Really helpful for a broad overview of writing a blog.
